title: Temp Street Closure Intersections
description:
A. SUMMARY This dataset contains a list of intersections impacted by upcoming and current street closures occurring as a result of the Shared Spaces program, certain special events, and some construction work. This dataset only includes street closures permitted by the San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency (SFMTA). It doesn’t include street closures managed by other City departments such as Public Works or the Police Department. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED The data is exported from the Street Closure Salesforce database which is maintained by the SFMTA ISCOTT unit and converted to the geometry of streets and intersections based on closed street extent descriptions. C. UPDATE PROCESS Database is updated constantly. This report is issued daily. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET Please be aware that this dataset only contains temporary street closure events that are permitted (“status = permitted”). This dataset contains various types of street closures. If you are looking for a particular type please use the TYPE field to select the appropriate closure type (Ex. type = Shared Space). E. RELATED DATASETS
  • For street segments affected by temporary street closures (rather than the intersection points provided here), please see the Temporary Street Closures dataset.
  • For street closures in the WZDx standard format, see the Temporary Street Closures in the Work Zone Data Exchange (WZDx) Format dataset.

columns.name: case_num
columns.description: case number

columns.name: case_name
columns.description: case name

columns.name: type
columns.description: closure type - Shared Space, Special Event or STP (special traffic permit)

columns.name: status
columns.description: ase status. This dataset only displays closures with a ‘PERMITTED’ status

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: start date of closure in date/time format (local time)

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: start time of closure (local time)

columns.name: start_dt
columns.description: start date and time of closure in date/time format (local time)

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: end date of closure in date/time format (local time)

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: end time of closure (local time)

columns.name: end_dt
columns.description: end date and time of closure in date/time format (local time)

columns.name: loc_desc
columns.description: closure location description

columns.name: cnn
columns.description: CNN of intersection impacted by closure. CNN is unique ID of San Francisco’s street centerlines/intersections

columns.name: street
columns.description: street impacted by closure

columns.name: x_street
columns.description: crossed street for the entire closure

columns.name: is_open
columns.description: indicates if the intersection is opened during the closure. The default value is set to yes if that is the end intersection of the closed street segment.

columns.name: direction
columns.description: direction of street being closed

columns.name: veh_imp
columns.description: Vehicle impacts – values are https://github.com/usdot-jpo-ode/wzdx/blob/main/spec-content/enumerated-types/VehicleImpact.md

columns.name: info
columns.description: project information if available

columns.name: start_utc
columns.description: start date/time in UTC time

columns.name: end_utc
columns.description: end date/time in UTC time

columns.name: shape
columns.description: point attribute

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was created in in the source dataset

columns.name: last_edited_date
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was most recently updated in in the source dataset

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was most recently updated in in the source dataset

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was most recently updated in Socrata

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Police Districts' (qgnn-b9vv) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Analysis Neighborhoods' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods' (jwn9-ihcz) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
